Visited the clinic based on a friend's reference. We got appointment with Dr. Anusha. She is very friendly and explained our doubts clearly. Post-treatment also we are able to clarify issues with Dr. Anusha through phone. We had very nice experience at Hegde hospitals with Dr. Anusha.

**** ****** *** very kind at heart. Very happy that we have convinced in first attempt with minimal medication. The staff were very polite to us.  *** ** *** **** ****** * ******** Doctor is very supportive and suggest well. Definitely recommend Hegde Suchitra.

Such a wonderful doctor with in-depth knowledge and practical exposure.  
Rarely you find such doctors, it really worked out for us. She is polite and caring and has long term relationship with all her clients. 
Not just a doctor, but an amazing human being.

review: Good consultation with Dr Anusha madam.. everything is explained very clearly and treated us very well  happy to share that I m pregnant  in first IVF cycle  I defnetyrefet this Hegde ..  and team also very good very thankful to Hegde

Dr.Anusha  is a wonderful doctor we meet in our journey for conceive. These days it is very difficult to  find a  doctor with knowledge and patience . She explained everything in detail during our visits. She carefully listen to our journey and she guided us in the correct way. She treats her patients very well. Before we meet Dr. Anusha Boddu we visited multiple hospitals and found doctors are difficult to get hold and we were afraid if any queries and issue during our pregnancy journey it will be really tough to resolve them, but luckily we meet Dr.Anusha Boddu who is available for her patients 24X7. I can say this because we have contacted her during her off hours and still she responded very freely which made us more comfortable to reach out to her.  Hegde hospital staff are very polite and answerable. I will definitely recommend Hegde hospital and especially Dr. Anusha Boddu.

We came here for the first time without any reference, Anusha Madam is the first doctor we meet here at hedge, firstly madam prescribed for basic blood test and concluded the solution post reviewing the report, doctor was too the point to the solution without unnecessary treatment or medications, doctor has prescribed few medicines and with in a month my wife got conceived.Madam was so supportive and she used to answer/ clarify all our doubles in in-person or even in the calls.
